title: Lupari: Werewolf Hunter
description: “I am a son who has sworn vengeance for the senseless killing the creature relishes in. I am a Wolver who dares to hunt werewolves. I am Lupări.”Dorian is finally free from the werewolf's curse. Or maybe not. All of his allies have turned into enemies save for an old friend who has returned to offer some much needed help. As the werewolf pandemic spreads, will it be enough to save him from the Lupari and the rise of the Luna?This is the third book in The Wolf of Dorian Gray - A Werewolf Spawned by the Evil of Man (Book 1)- Purgatoryof the Werewolf (Book 2)- Lupă Werewolf Hunter (Book 3)
author: Brian S. Ference
